pages.title: FE Power Port
pages.text: The FE Power Port allows you to insert and extract energy from the Energizer.$(br2)Any Forge Energy-compatible cable or generator can be connected to the FE Power Port.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes
